item.title: Charlie Hunnam Goes Full-on ‘Monster’ in Haunting Official Trailer for ‘The Ed Gein Story’
item.description: The third season in the Netflix horror anthology is described as the most harrowing yet.

item.title: Charlie Hunnam Unveils His Bone-Chilling Ed Gein in ‘Monster’ Teaser Trailer
item.description: The next season of Ryan Murphy and Ian Brennan’s horror anthology focuses on the infamous serial murderer and body snatcher.

item.title: Emmys: HBO and Max Score Most Nominations, Apple Takes a Big Bite
item.description: With a lot of help from ’The Penguin’ and ‘The White Lotus,’ HBO and its sibling streamer earned a record high number of nods for the two platforms.
